content: forest green hat yarn aran weight model is wearing hat made with impeccable solids by loops and threads hook 5 5 mm abbreviations -chain chain -slip_stitch slip_stitch -yo-slip_stitch-blo yarn over slip_stitch back loop only explained in details here pattern foundation chain chain 51 you are going to make 6 segments each segment narrows down at the top to create a crown of the hat 1st segment row 1 yo-slip_stitch-blt into 3rd chain from hook and next 39 stitches chain 1 turn last 10 stitches of foundation row remain as a chain for now row 2 yo-slip_stitch-bl across the whole row 40 stitches chain 1 turn row 3 yo-slip_stitch-bl across the whole row and 2 stitches from one row below 42 stitches chain 1 turn row 4 yo-slip_stitch-bl across the whole row 42 stitches chain 1 turn row 5 yo-slip_stitch-bl across the whole row and 2 stitches from one row below 44 stitches chain 1 turn row 6 yo-slip_stitch-bl across the whole row 44 stitches chain 1 turn row 7 yo-slip_stitch-bl across the whole row and 2 stitches from one row below 46 stitches chain 1 turn row 8 yo-slip_stitch-bl across the whole row 46 stitches chain 1 turn row 9 yo-slip_stitch-bl across the whole row and 2 stitches from one row below 48 stitches chain 1 turn row 10 yo-slip_stitch-bl across the whole row 48 stitches chain 1 turn row 11 yo-slip_stitch-bl across the whole row and 2 stitches from one row below 50 stitches chain 1 turn row 12 yo-slip_stitch-bl across the whole row 50 stitches chain 1 turn repeat the segment row 5 more times for the last segment don t crochet the row 11 and 12 instead you are going to make the seam and close the two side of the hat bring together the two edges keep the yarn underneath by picking up a stitch on the left and a stitch on the right flat slip_stitch across 50 stitches refer to details here about flat slip_stitch cut the yarn leaving a few inches of tail using a darning needle pick up stitches along top edge pull and tighten the hole at the top tie and weave in the end all done
